- (void APIRequest.)sendRequest  

Use this method to make urlconnection with InMobi server. Call this method only after setupRequest method,so that NSURLRequest object has been create.d

- (void APIRequest.)setupRequest: (NSString *)  urlString
userData: (UserInfo *)  userInfoRef
requestMethod: (NSString *)  method 

This method is used to prepare a NSURLRequest object, which will be used to request an ad from InMobi server, or register a click to InMobi server.

Parameters:
urlString The ad-server url to which an ad request has to be made.
userInfoRef Instance of UserInfo to obtain device/user provided values.
requestMethod method The method type of NSURLRequest, typically GET/POST.
- (void APIRequest.)storeCachedUrl: (NSString *)  cachedUrl
andCachedUrlLife: (NSString *)  cachedUrlLife 

Stores a cached url & its timespan in NSURLDefaults.

Parameters:
cachedUrl The url to be cached
cachedUrlLife The timespan in seconds of the url
- (void APIRequest.)uploadDeviceInfo  

This method is triggers the upload of device information to InMobi server.
